LanguageData.RC2_MakeFruitPreservesBulk.label: make fruit preserves in bulk
LanguageData.RC2_MakeFruitPreservesBulk.description: Uses sweets and fruit to preserve fruit. Very tasty. Makes 25.
LanguageData.RC2_CrispsBulk.label: make crisps in bulk
LanguageData.RC2_CrispsBulk.description: Make crisps out of vegetables, grains, or fruits. Most commonly made out of potatos or corn though. A tasty, salty snack! Makes 25.
LanguageData.RC2_MakeCupcakeBulk.label: bake cupcakes in bulk
LanguageData.RC2_MakeCupcakeBulk.description: Cupcakes! These delicious, single-serve cakes are a tasty treat for birthday parties or parties in general. Made out of flour, sweeteners, and eggs. Makes 50.
LanguageData.RC2_MakeIcecreamBulk.label: make icecream in bulk
LanguageData.RC2_MakeIcecreamBulk.description: Uses milk, sweeteners, and fruit to make a tub of icecream. Delicious and great for cooling you down on a warm day! Makes 25.
LanguageData.RC2_MakeChocolateIcecreamBulk.label: make chocolate icecream in bulk
LanguageData.RC2_MakeChocolateIcecreamBulk.descriptio: Uses milk, sweeteners, and chocolate to make a tub of chocolate icecream. Delicious and great for cooling you down on a warm day!
LanguageData.RC2_MakeCandyBulk.label: make candy in bulk
LanguageData.RC2_MakeCandyBulk.description: Uses sweets to make delicious, delicious candy. Makes 50.
LanguageData.RC2_MakeJuiceBulk.label: make juice in bulk
LanguageData.RC2_MakeJuiceBulk.description: Uses one or more fruits to make delicious juice. Makes 25.
LanguageData.RC2_MakePastryBulk.label: bake pastries in bulk
LanguageData.RC2_MakePastryBulk.description: Uses sweets and flour to make pastries. No not pasties, pastries! Careful of any law enforcement nearby, however, as they'll eat it all. Makes 50.
LanguageData.RC2_ProcessCoffeeBulk.label: brew coffee in bulk
LanguageData.RC2_ProcessCoffeeBulk.description: Brew raw coffee beans into delicous coffee. Makes 25.
LanguageData.RC2_BrewTeaBulk.label: brew green tea in bulk
LanguageData.RC2_BrewTeaBulk.description: Brew tea leaves into green tea. Makes 25.
LanguageData.RC2_MakeHardtackBulk.label: make hardtack in bulk
LanguageData.RC2_MakeHardtackBulk.description: Make hardtack, a tough biscuit or cracker that lasts for years and fills you up. Doesn't taste too great though. Makes 70.
LanguageData.RC2_ProcessSoybeanBulk.label: make tofu in bulk
LanguageData.RC2_ProcessSoybeanBulk.description: Make tofu out of soybeans. Ew. Makes 5.
LanguageData.RC2_ProcessAgaveBulk.label: make nectar from agave in bulk
LanguageData.RC2_ProcessAgaveBulk.description: Process agave fruit into a delicious, sticky nectar. Makes 5.
LanguageData.RC2_ProcessCacaoBulk.label: make chocolate in bulk
LanguageData.RC2_ProcessCacaoBulk.description: Combine cocoa beans and sweeteners to make delicous, delicious chocolate. Makes 25.
LanguageData.CookSimpleMealBulk.label: cook simple meal in bulk
LanguageData.CookSimpleMealBulk.description: Cook a straightforward meal from one ingredient. Makes 10.
LanguageData.RC2_CookFineMealBulk.label: cook fine meal in bulk
LanguageData.RC2_CookFineMealBulk.description: Cook a somewhat complex meal from a combination of meat and plant ingredients.
LanguageData.RC2_Make_KibbleBulk.label: make kibble in bulk
LanguageData.RC2_Make_KibbleBulk.description: Make animal kibble by combining raw meat and plants. Makes 5x as much as before!
LanguageData.RC2_Make_PemmicanBulk.label: make pemmican
LanguageData.RC2_Make_PemmicanBulk.description: Make pemmican, a preserved combination of meat and plant food. It doesn't taste amazing, but lasts a long time without refrigeration. Makes 10x as much.
